bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8:30 AM. Morning recess is from 10 to 10:20 AM. Lunch is from 12:00 to 12:35 PM.  For Kindergarden to 3rd grader, and school ends at 2:35 PM. For 4th and 5th graders, school end at 3:05 PM.
